title: Frontend Engineer (React)
description: Build and maintain responsive user interfaces using React. Collaborate with product and design teams to ship features.
responsibilities: Develop new user-facing features using React
Collaborate with designers to implement UI/UX
qualifications: Good understanding of HTML/CSS and modern JavaScript (ES6+)

title: Backend Engineer (Node.js)
description: Design and implement scalable backend services and APIs. Work on data pipelines and integrations.
responsibilities: Design database schemas and optimize queries
Participate in code reviews and architecture discussions
qualifications: Experience with Node.js and a relational or NoSQL database

title: Product Designer
description: Design beautiful and usable product experiences. Drive user research and prototype flows.
responsibilities: Create wireframes, prototypes and high-fidelity designs
Conduct usability testing and iterate on feedback
Work with engineers to implement designs
qualifications: Strong visual and interaction design skills

title: Junior Data Analyst
description: Work with data to create reports and dashboards. Support the analytics team in deriving insights.
responsibilities: Assist in data-cleaning and ETL tasks
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand requirements
qualifications: Bachelors in a quantitative field preferred

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Maintain and improve CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure. Ensure reliability and observability.
responsibilities: Monitor systems and respond to incidents

title: Intern - Software Engineer
description: 3-month internship working across frontend and backend tasks, mentored by senior engineers.
responsibilities: Learn best practices from senior engineers
qualifications: Currently enrolled in a CS or related program
